info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 5:09PM CDT until July 02 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Oldham County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hartley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 508 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Conlen to Ware to 7 miles southwest of Sedan, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Hartley, Ware, Romero and Conlen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
